author: Moe Aliaff
description: I had to boil a can of condensed milk for three hours to make the dulce de leche but its sweetened caramelised milk flavour is the heart of this unusual cocktail. Rum fortifies with banana, PX sherry and lemon all adding important elements.
name: Carousel

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
*Special ingredient #1: Dulce de leche (30ml is approx
